attributes.action: Recall Russell Sharp to duty to complete his service following his and the BBC's dishonesty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Russell Sharp joined the Army under false pretences attempted to uncover bullying within the Infantry Training Centre, Catterick.  He only proved that bullies are very very rare and dealt with properly and expeditiously with out BBC intervention. 
He then told further lies to be discharged from the military before finishing his training.  He should now be recalled to duty and complete his training before going to a front line unit.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the MOD.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
